answers.answer: Idk if its normal...but glad I'm not the only one!! This is my second, im only 10 weeks and showing too! Just be careful of gestational diabetes with excessive weight gain.

question: So this is my first pregnancy, im only 21 years old and before I got prego I weighed 125. Ive been showing since I was 9 weeks. I am now 17 weeks and my stomach literally hardened over night! Is this normal?  Also have hard time catching my breath.
title: baby bump
